Html:
Is it possible to use NAudio to set the systems default playback device?
(Windows 7x64)

Best regards, Tom

I'm afraid I don't know what the Windows API call to do this is, but if it is part of the Core Audio API, there is a decent chance that NAudio contains at least some of the interop to let you do this.
If you are not able to find any information how to do that, I would recommend to use http://www.rohitab.com/apimonitor to take a look behind the scenes of the windows gui.
